description: Try our easy to follow Mummy Cupcakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mummy Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.75 cup milk (and 2 tbs milk for buttercream icing)
100g butter, melted, cooled slightly (and 125g butter softened for buttercream icing)
1.5 cup icing sugar mixture (for buttercream icing)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line 16 cupcake holes from two 12-hole cupcake pans with paper cases.
Sift flour and cocoa into a large bowl. Mix in sugar and choc bits.
Combine milk, egg, jam, and melted butter in a small bowl. Fold gently into flour and cocoa until just combined. Divide evenly among prepared cases. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until cooked. Cool.
For buttercream icing, beat softened butter in a large bowl until pale and creamy. Add icing sugar gradually, beating constantly until combined. Add milk and mix well.
Use a piping bag fitted with a ribbon weave tip to pipe icing over cupcakes like mummy bandages. Use Smarties for eyes.
